entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 03:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.2°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 near noon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
